$addons.title: Addons
$addons.description:
Addons defines a list of keys used to identify tax addons that apply special
normalization, scenarios, and validation rules to a document.

$tags.title: Tags
$tags.description:
Tags are used to help identify specific tax scenarios or requirements that may
apply changes to the contents of the document or imply a specific meaning.
Converters may use tags to help identify specific situations that do not have
a specific extension, for example; self-billed or partial invoices may be
identified by their respective tags.

oneOf.title: Delivery Advice
oneOf.description:
A delivery or despatch advice document send by the supplier to indicate how
an order is to be delivered.

oneOf.title: Delivery Note
oneOf.description:
A delivery note is a document accompanying a shipment of goods that lists the
items included in the shipment.

oneOf.title: Waybill
oneOf.description:
A waybill is a document issued by a carrier giving details and instructions
relating to the shipment of a consignment of goods.

oneOf.title: Delivery Receipt
oneOf.description:
A delivery receipt is a document that is signed by the person who receives
goods to confirm that they have been received.

series.title: Series
series.description:
Series is used to identify groups of deliveries by date, business area, project,
type, customer, a combination of any, or other company specific data.
If the output format does not support the series as a separate field, it will be
prepended to the code for presentation with a dash (`-`) for separation.

code.title: Code
code.description:
Code is a sequential identifier that uniquely identifies the delivery. The code can
be left empty initially, but is **required** to **sign** the document.

issue_date.title: Issue Date
issue_date.description: When the delivery document is to be issued.

issue_time.title: Issue Time
issue_time.description:
IssueTime is an optional field that may be useful to indicate the time of day when
the delivery was issued. Some regions and formats may require this field to be set.
An empty string will be automatically updated to reflect the current time, otherwise
the field can be left with a nil value.

value_date.title: Value Date
value_date.description: When the taxes of this delivery become accountable, if none set, the issue date is used.

exchange_rates.title: Exchange Rates
exchange_rates.description: Exchange rates to be used when converting the invoices monetary values into other currencies.

ordering.title: Ordering
ordering.description: Ordering details for the delivery, including links to other documents.

preceding.title: Preceding Details
preceding.description:
Key information regarding previous delivery documents that this one will either
extend or replace.

tracking.title: Tracking
tracking.description:
Tracking is used to define specific codes or IDs that may be used to
identify and track delivery.

despatch_date.title: Despatch Date
despatch_date.description: DespatchDate is the date when the goods are expected to be despatched.

receive_date.title: Receive Date
receive_date.description: ReceiveDate is the date when the goods are expected to be received.

tax.title: Tax
tax.description: Special tax configuration for calculating totals.

supplier.title: Supplier
supplier.description: The entity supplying the goods or services and usually responsible for paying taxes.

customer.title: Customer
customer.description: Legal entity receiving the goods or services, may be nil in certain circumstances such as simplified invoices.

despatcher.title: Despatcher
despatcher.description: The party who will despatch the goods defined in the invoice.

receiver.title: Receiver
receiver.description: The party who will receive delivery of the goods defined in the invoice.

courier.title: Courier
courier.description: The courier responsible for delivering the goods.

lines.title: Lines
lines.description: List of lines representing each of the items to be ordered.

discounts.title: Discounts
discounts.description: Discounts or allowances applied to order totals

charges.title: Charges
charges.description: Charges or surcharges applied to order totals

totals.title: Totals
totals.description: Summary of all the order totals, including taxes (calculated).

notes.title: Notes
notes.description:
Unstructured information that is relevant to the delivery, such as correction or additional
legal details.

complements.title: Complements
complements.description: Additional complementary objects that add relevant information to the delivery.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Additional semi-structured data that doesn't fit into the body of the delivery.

attachments.title: Attachments
attachments.description:
Attachments provide additional information or supporting documents that are not included
in the main document. It is important that attachments are not used for alternative
versions of the PDF, for that, see "links" inside the envelope headers.

Delivery.description: Delivery document used to describe the delivery of goods or potentially also services.

website.title: Website
website.description: Website to access for more tracking details

Tracking.description: Tracking stores tracking information about a delivery.
